description:
Looking to upgrade your first pair of shoes or get something a little more technical? The Kubo have subtle asymmetry and a slight downturn for one-shoe quiver performance in most terrain. The supportive midsole and XS Grip rubber support your foot on small edges in near-vertical terrain, and the toe rubber and high-performance heel provide grip when heel or toe hooking in steep terrain.

  • Leather and microfibre upper with opposing hook-and-loop closures for a precise fit
  • Cushioned tongue provides comfort on long days or in foot jams
  • Rubber toe patch grips to technical toe hooks
  • Full-length 1.1mm Laspoflex midsole provides maximum edging support
  • 4mm Vibram® XS Edge™ rubber outsole sticks to small edges
  • La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size
name: La Sportiva Kubo Climbing Shoes - Men's
